• JSON
  • XML
  • YAML

Request

PUT /quotation/5231cc894ab63c53dc90053d/make_down_payment_invoice/
Content-Type: application/json
{
    "due_date": "2013-10-12", 
    "percentage": "0.2", 
    "tax_applied": "/api/v1/tax/5231cc884ab63c53dc900537/"
}

Response

200 OK
Content-Type: application/json
{
    "down_payment_invoice_uri": "/api/v1/down_payment_invoice/5231ccad4ab63c53dc900553/"
}

Request

PUT /quotation/5231cc8e4ab63c53dc900541/make_down_payment_invoice/
Content-Type: application/xml
<object>
  <due_date>2013-10-12</due_date>
  <percentage>0.2</percentage>
  <tax_applied>/api/v1/tax/5231cc884ab63c53dc900537/</tax_applied>
</object>

Response

200 OK
Content-Type: application/xml; charset=utf-8
<response>
  <down_payment_invoice_uri>/api/v1/down_payment_invoice/5231ccb34ab63c53dc900558/</down_payment_invoice_uri>
</response>

Request

PUT /quotation/5231cc924ab63c53dc900545/make_down_payment_invoice/
Content-Type: text/yaml
{due_date: !!python/unicode '2013-10-12', percentage: !!python/unicode '0.2', tax_applied: !!python/unicode '/api/v1/tax/5231cc884ab63c53dc900537/'}

Response

200 OK
Content-Type: text/yaml; charset=utf-8
{down_payment_invoice_uri: !!python/unicode '/api/v1/down_payment_invoice/5231ccba4ab63c53dc90055d/'}
